forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Widely scattered showers or a thunderstorm this morning. Then partly cloudy. High 13C. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 30%. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 56F. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 55F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 56F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
